text: allaah vahee hai, jisane belon vaale tatha bina belon vaale baag paida kiye tatha khajoor aur khet, jinase vibhinn prakaar kee paidaavaar hotee hai aur zaitun tatha anaar samaroop tatha svaad mein vibhinn, isaka phal khao, jab phale aur phal todane ke samay kuchh daan karo tatha apavyay[1] (beja kharch) na karo. nihsandeh, allaah beja kharch karane vaalon se prem nahin karata
